casebody.data:
In re MAY LEE INDUSTRIES, INC., Appellant. No. 1249, Docket 74-1982. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Aug. 12, 1974. Decided Aug. 21, 1974. David C. Buxbaum, New York City, for appellant. John F. Triggs, New York City (Robert M. McCulloch, Jr., J. Rush Barnes, Hawkins, Delafield & Wood, New York City, of counsel), for appellee Chartered Bank. William M. Silverman, New York City, for appellee Chemical Bank.

Before OAKES, Circuit Judge, and FRANKEL and KELLEHER, District Judges.*

Of the Southern District of New York and the Central District of California, respectively, sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Ward below, 380 F.Supp. 1 (S.D.N.Y.1974).
